knimeNode.name: Read from GeoJSON
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads Spatial Data from GeoJSON format

intro.p: Reads spatial data stored in GeoJSON format and decodes the geometries into WKT (Well-known Text Representation). Decodes every attribute of the spatial features as a column of a corresponding KNIME type.

Note that GeoJSON data is assumed by default to be encoded in the Coordinate Reference System WGS84. The GeoJSON format allows to define the CRS in the file, but we do not read it. You might select another coordinate system in the options if necessary.

The actual decoding of the GeoJSON format is done using the geotools opensource library. The support of GeoJSON is unsupported in GeoTools, so this node might work in most cases but not support the full GeoJSON format.

The Coordinate Reference System to interpret the numbers in latitude ane longitude
